text: was a town located in Akaiwa District, Okayama Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the town had an estimated population of 8,854 and a density of 193.61 persons per km². The total area was 45.73 km². On March 7, 2005, Kumayama, along with the towns of Akasaka, San'yō and Yoshii (all from Akaiwa District), were merged to create the city of Akaiwa. Category:Dissolved municipalities of Okayama Prefecture
title: Kumayama, Okayama
